title: Learning the Basics: Accidentals
description: Learn about accidentals on the piano keyboard

sections.title: Basic Information
content: Accidentals raises or lowers notes by half a step.

content.text: Sharps raises the notes, while flats lower the notes!
content.subpoint: Trick to Remember Equivalencies! : when converting between a sharp to a flat, the flat equivalent is always the note above! (C# = D♭) and vice versa!

content: Note: E# = F, B# = C, C♭ = B, F♭ = E
